meanings.definition: Not charitable or generous in actions or attitudes.
meanings.sent1: She was uncharitable towards the homeless man, refusing to give him any money.
meanings.sent2: The uncharitable woman never donated to charity or helped those in need.
meanings.sent3: It was uncharitable of him to keep all the cookies to himself and not share with his friends.
meanings.sent4: Her uncharitable behavior cast a dark shadow over the community event.
meanings.sent5: The uncharitable landlord raised the rent prices, making it difficult for tenants to afford their homes.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of kindness or sympathy towards others.
meanings.sent1: The uncharitable remarks made by the teacher hurt the students' feelings.
meanings.sent2: He was known for his uncharitable comments that often left people feeling upset.
meanings.sent3: It was uncharitable of the cat to steal the dog's bed when there were plenty of other places to sleep.
meanings.sent4: Her uncharitable attitude created a barrier between her and her coworkers.
meanings.sent5: The uncharitable actions of the bully made the school environment hostile and unwelcoming.
